DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine relative ( ICC ) absolute intertester reliability 6-Minutes Walking Test hip fracture patient ( N=50 ) outpatient facility . The data collection conduct two physiotherapist , blind . The physiotherapist randomize equal number baseline test .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability 6-Minutes Walking Test Hip Fracture Patients
DOC.criteria: 60 year Hip fracture patient Intra Extra Capsular hip fracture Testing within 3 5 week postsurgery outpatient facility No weightbearing restriction fracture limb Normal cognitive level ( Mini Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) score ≥20 point ) Participants experience hip relate pain le moderate accord Verbal Ranking Scale rest To ability write understand danish language MMSE score ≤19 point
